techmeme.title: A US Treasury Department document says "digital content creators", including podcasters, social media influencers, and streamers, are eligible for tax-free tips (Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter)
Amazon and Netflix partner to let advertisers buy Netflix ad inventory via Amazon's demand-side platform, after Amazon signed a similar deal with Disney in June (Brian Steinberg/Variety)
Israeli chip monitoring startup ProteanTecs raised a $51M Series D led by IAG, with participation from Arm, Samsung, and more, taking its total funding to $250M (Meir Orbach/CTech)
Brain Co., co-founded by Jared Kushner, Elad Gil, and others to help enterprises and governments use AI, comes out of stealth with a $30M Series A (Forbes)
Bending Spoons agrees to acquire video platform Vimeo in an all-cash deal valued at ~$1.38B, set to close in Q4; Vimeo will be delisted from exchanges (Lynn Doan/Bloomberg)
